first_story_block: head towards the shed behind the house

action_results.action: You notice there is a padlock on the shed. Maybe you can find a key or a tool to get in.
action_results.result: head back towards the broken window of the farmhouse

action_results.action: You have to go through the window to look for tools. You careful break the window more to go inside.
action_results.result: go through window

action_results.action: You cut yourself on the edges as you're climbing in, but you make it inside.You find some thick sturdy shirts and there are rusted scattered tool scattered throughout. There doesn't seem to be any food around, however you wonder if there is a tool or key to open the shed.
action_results.result: search the farmhouse

action_results.action: You're Not the best educated when it comes to tools but you have an idea of what kind of tool you need to use. You see lots of shovels, rakes, and pitchforks. You notice something that looks like big pliers...maybe that can work?
action_results.result: grab bolt cutter

action_results.action: You could go back out to open the shed but it is starting to get dark. You think about resting in the farmhouse or going to check the shed out.
action_results.result: go back to shed

action_results.action: Dusk is setting and you climb out the window unscathed. You walk over to the shed and begin to attempt cutting the lock off. Your stomach growls as you place the bolt cutter on the lock. In that moment you think you hear rustling behind you. You turn to look and nothing is there. so you resume cutting the padlock off.
action_results.result: enter the shed

action_results.action: You remove the padlock and slowly open the door. With the sun setting, it's a bit difficult to see the contents of the shed.
action_results.result: search the shed

action_results.action: You can make out that there are some storage shelves and a few tables. You see something that looks a tin pot or jug to some sort. You check it and it has nothing inside. Next to it on a table you see a matchbox. You take the matchbox because it's likely to help you see.
action_results.result: strike a match

action_results.action: The first match goes dull quick. The second and third match break as you try to strike them. There are only two matches left. You try to relax a bit to keep yourself from breaking another match. You strike the match and it stays lit.
action_results.result: search the shed slowly

action_results.action: To your right you see jars filled with preserved fruits and vegetables. To your left you see more jars but can make out the contents clearly.
action_results.result: G4

action_results.action: go back to farmhouse
action_results.result: You head back to farmhouse and begin climbing through the window again. You hear a slight movement inside.

action_results.action: stop moving to listen
action_results.result: You don't hear any more movement or sounds so you continue through the window.

action_results.action: look around the farmhouse again
action_results.result: Since you heard the noise you are a bit cautious and want to scan the area the best you can. You remember you have one match left.

action_results.action: strike match
action_results.result: From the tiny glow of the match you can see bails of hay, tools, and ladder leading up to a secondary lofted area.

action_results.action: go up the ladder
action_results.result: You figure the lofted area would be safer for you to sleep. Your match flickers out as you make your way up.

action_results.action: move slowly towards the back wall
action_results.result: You could make out that there is more hay up here but everything else is quite hard to see. As you make your way forward towards the hay you hit your head on something cold and metal-like.

action_results.action: use your hand to access the object
action_results.result: It seems to be thick old hook connected by chain link. When you touch it, it creaks a bit. You hear another slight movement that happens in reaction to the chain creaking. The sound seems to have come from the hay you were heading towards.

action_results.action: continue towards the hay bales
action_results.result: You're not very certain what the sound could have been but whatever it is didn't sound too large.

action_results.action: approach the hay bales
action_results.result: You stand in front of the hay bales and squint your eyes to try to see something. After a few minutes without hearing any movement or sound you lay down on the hay. It's a little prickly but it's better than a cold floor.

action_results.action: try to sleep
action_results.result: Your mind races as you try to process what exactly is going on in the world. With very little memory of yourself and your surroundings, you try to meditate and access memories. After an hour you feel as if you know before you were heading somewhere, or there was a destination in mind at least. However, why or when you entered the hospital is still a mystery to you. You fall asleep amongst your thoughts.
